text: Petropavlovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Denisovsky Selsoviet, Meleuzovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 209 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 22 km from Meleuz. == References == Category:Rural localities in Meleuzovsky District
title: Petropavlovka, Meleuzovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
